inn1.comm: on target, bowled on a good length in the channel outside off, punched off the back foot to short cover
almost chopped it on, short of a length just marginally outside off, Sehwag does not have enough room but still goes for the cut, gets an inside edge that doesn't miss the off stump by much
shot! In the slot, full outside off and Sehwag just pushes it firmly down the ground wide of mid-off for his first boundary
straying in line and pays the price, too wide down the leg side and a diving Sangakkara has no chance. A couple of good balls followed by two horrors
short of a good length on middle and leg, worked away off the back foot to midwicket
beaten this time! A teasing line outside off with a hint of away movement, Sehwag chases it but fails to make contact
down the leg side again, a poor start for Kulasekara here, given a wide
full and wide, there to drive, he reaches for it to smash it past cover, misses as the ball swings away after pitching
good length on the off stump, defended towards cover and sets off for a single, they get another run on the overthrow
beauty, good length on the off stump, inducing Gambhir into going for the drive, swings away just a touch after pitching to beat the outside edge
and again, he lunges forward to defend, it's bowled much fuller but the away movement catches him off guard yet again
swinging in this time, but Gambhir plays this well, watches the ball all the way to the keeper as it is bowled a touch wide outside off
short of a length on the off stump, opens the face and defends it to point
good length outside off and seemed to hold its line this time, left alone to the keeper

almost! The mid-off is standing a touch too wide, full on the off stump, Sehwag tries to chip that over mid-on, gets the leading edge that lands where mid-off should actually be fielding. Gets a single
beaten, swung away sharply after pitching on a good length on the off stump, beating Gambhir as he came forward to defend. Sangakkara is standing up now
fuller outside off and holding its line, left alone to the keeper
on middle and leg, Gambhir tucks it behind square for an easy single

gone!! In the slot outside off stump, Sehwag is half-forward, doesn't quite get to the pitch, goes through with the shot anyway and ends up mistiming an attempted drive straight to Jayasuriya at mid-off, who takes a good catch diving forward
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to short cover
maintaining a stump to stump line to Gambhir here, on middle, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
done in by the outswinger, landed on a good length outside off, Dhoni tried to defend that off the back foot to cover, the late movement away from him took the ball just past the outside edge
covered it well this time, much shorter on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to the bowler

appeal for lbw, missing leg, full on middle and leg and swinging down further, Dhoni comes down the track and tries to flick that away wide of midwicket, is rapped on the pads but Dharmasena shakes his head
good length outside off and moving away, left alone
poor ball and gets the treatment, it's full outside off and Dhoni smashes it over cover for a boundary
good length outside off, pushed gently wide of cover for a quick single
nipped back in sharply this time, short of a length on the off stump, Dhoni was nicely behind it and defended it on the leg side
full on the pads, flicked away wide of square leg for a couple
short and wide, fails to cash in, cuts it away straight to point
fuller on the off stump and moved in a touch, went for a flowing drive through the covers, got a thick inside edge towards midwicket instead. He's going for his shots here
good length, just marginally outside off, left alone by Gambhir
poor fielding at square leg, Dhoni turns it away there and gets an easy single but Kandamby fails to back up the throw and allows the batsmen to steal a couple more
good length on the off stump, closes the face to place it wide of midwicket for a comfortable single.
angling into the batsman from wide the crease, a hint of inward movement as well, Dhoni lets it go but that didn't miss the off stump by much
short of a good length outside off, Dhoni gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
a touch fuller, drives it on the up straight to cover.
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
swinging away after landing on a good length outside off, opens the face to run it down to third man for a single
swinging into Dhoni, lands full on middle and leg, pushed towards Murali at mid-on for a quick single
goes for it this time, was the right ball, fuller outside off and he makes room to smash that over cover, gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket
appeal for lbw, pitched outside leg stump and moved into Gambhir, was also a touch high as he tried to whip that away towards square leg
short of a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot to cover

quick single, and overthrows result in three runs, pushed off the back foot to mid-on and an attempt to throw down the stumps at the non-strikers end goes awry. Jayasuriya gives chase but the batsmen have run three by then
a probing line outside off, holding its line this time, defended off the front foot to mid-off
slower ball bowled full outside leg, Gambhir picks it and defends it straight to short square leg
Maharoof was testing his patience there, he finally opens up, full outside off and Gambhir charges down the track to loft that over cover for a boundary
edged and wide of slip, short of a length on middle and off and moved away as Gambhir tried to defend that off the back foot
short on middle and leg, tries to work that away behind square, is struck high on the pads
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot straight to cover where a misfield yields a couple more
on middle and leg, driven to mid-on for a quick single
fielded brilliantly at short point, short and wide, Dhoni cuts it fiercely but Jayawardene is equal to the task, reacting sharply to prevent a certain four
pushed wide of cover for  a quick single
full outside off stump, driven firmly but straight to mid-off
good length on middle and off, defended watchfully towards cover off the front foot
fuller on middle and off, punched between cover and mid-off for a quick single
Maharoof continues to bowl well to Gambhir, cramped him for room there, was short of a length on the off stump, defended on the off side
marginally wide of the off stump this time, guided to third man for a single
comes down the track but the bowler spots him, bangs it in short outside off, Dhoni punches it to mid-off and sets off for a quick single
short of a length outside off, opens the face and chops it wide of a diving point for a single

Sri Lanka have been poor in the field today, its short and wide and Dhoni cuts it away wide of third man, Kulasekara runs to his right and tries to stop the ball with his foot, the ball predictably rolls over the boundary ropes
pushed off the back foot wide of mid-off for a single
starts well, bowled short of a good length on middle and leg, defended off the back foot towards square leg
down the leg side, given a wide, Dhoni tries to glance it down fine, misses
short of a length outside off, cut away straight to point
slower ball bowled short outside off, opens the face to run it down wide of Jayasuriya at third man for a couple
short and wide, cut away uppishly towards third man for a single, didn't get it as square as he wanted to
oversteps, short of a length outside off, chopped wide of point for a quick single
full on the pads, driven wide of mid-on for a single. Didn't cost much that
good bouncer banged in short on middle and leg, Gambhir tries to fend that away on the leg side, he's hit on the arm and the ball rolls down towards fine leg
full outside off and begging to be hit, Gambhir comes down the track and lofts it cleanly over mid-off for a one bounce four
sensible batting, it's full again, he pushes it just wide cover and scampers a single
short on middle and leg, he walks across and turns it away to fine leg for a single. It also brings up their 50 partnership
saw him coming down and changed his pace at the last moment, Gambhir picked the slower one, worked it away wide of square leg for a single
short of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, chopped down to short cover
short of a length on the off stump, Gambhir walks across and defends it to midwicket
good length on middle and off, defended to midwicket, Kapugedara throws down the stumps at the non-strikers end and the Indians get a run off the ricochet
short of a length outside off, cut away to third man off the back foot
kept a touch low there, short on middle and off, Gambhir got his bat down in time to defend it on the leg side
much fuller outside off, steered to third man for a single
short on the off stump, Dhoni rocks back and pulls it away in front of midwicket for an easy boundary
short of a length outside off, much slower through the air, Gambhir tries to run it down to third man, misses
short and wide, cut away to third man for a single

appeal for caught behind, there was a massive edge there, slower ball bowled short outside off, Dhoni goes for the cut, gets the outside edge and Sangakkara pouches it. The umpires have referred it upstairs, but the replays indicate the ball may have fallen just short. It's too close to call and the benefit of the doubt has gone to the batsman
short of a length outside off, struck firmly off the back foot wide of deep cover for a couple. The fielder there was caught napping
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
much quicker, bowled fuller on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
short outside off and Gambhir pulls it away over midwicket, erring in length just a touch and pays heavily
full on the pads, glanced down to fine leg for a single
good length on middle and leg, driven wide of mid-on for a single
down the leg side again. Given a wide
beaten, good comeback, short of a length outside off and hint of away movement, Gambhir just prods at it off the front foot, misses
full, almost yorker length on middle and off, defended to midwicket
almost, full and wide, going away with the angle, and Gambhir chases it. It's a little too wide and the ball just beats the outside edge as he goes for an expansive drive
short of a good length on the off stump, punched off the front foot to cover
full on the pads, swinging down leg, Dhoni is hit on the pads as he tries to flick it away towards square leg, gets a leg bye
good length on middle and off, defended watchfully to the bowler
straying on the pads, flicked away fine, Dilhara runs well to his left at fine leg and drags the ball back just inside the ropes. Three taken
shot! Short of a length outside off, cut away powerfully wide of deep point for a couple more. Runs coming easily here

misfield at midwicket and some carelessness in the deep allows the batsmen to come back for the second, first a fumble inside the circle to leak a single, and  then some lethargic fielding at deep square leg. Sri Lanka's poor day in the field continues
full on the pads, flicked away off the front foot to deep midwicket
another misfield, a horrific day in the field for the home team, punched off the front foot to cover where Jayawardene allows it to go through his legs for two runs
full outside off, gets forward and drives it firmly to mid-off
short of a length outside off, cut away to deep point for a single
full outside off, eased through the covers for an easy single
short outside off, rocks on the back foot and drags it towards deep midwicket for a single
marginally short outside off and pays the price, Dhoni just punches it off the back foot wide of cover to bisect the gap between long-off and deep cover for a boundary
similar delivery, pushed back to the bowler this time
full outside off, driven firmly to cover, Jayawardene does well to get his fingers to it, the batsmen sneak a single
full on the off stump, pushed uppishly back past the bowler, its timed pretty well and by the time long-off reaches it, the batsmen have run two
good length outside off, driven straight to cover this time
slower ball bowled short outside off,  run down to third man off the back foot for a single
tossed up on middle and off, spinning away, left alone to the keeper
short on the off stump, punched firmly off the back foot wide of deep cover for an easy couple
flighted on leg stump, defended to square leg
plays it inside out, flighted on middle, Gambhir comes down the track and drives it powerfully to short cover where Dilshan pulls off an excellent stop
down the leg side this time, no spin on that one, given a wide
short and wide, cut away straight to point, missed out there
tossed up outside off, lands full, driven back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, struck powerfully but straight to deep cover
good length on the off stump, defended on the off side short of cover

slower ball bowled full outside off, Gambhir launches into that one, lofting it cleanly over long-on for a massive six. That brings up his fifty, and he has worked wonders as an opener in this match. It also brings up the 100 partnership
full on the off stump, driven to deep cover for a single
good comeback, yorker fired in on middle, dug out well by Dhoni
slower ball bowled short outside off, pushed wide of point off the back foot for a quick single

big one! Flighted outside off and Dhoni latches onto it, charges down the track, takes it on the half volley, and smashes it over the deep midwicket boundary for a huge six. 50 for Dhoni, his 27th in ODIs
tossed up outside off, opens the face to place it wide of point for a single
tossed up on the off stump, driven straight to cover
Murali's getting the treatment her, flighted on middle and off, Gambhir is tempted, he charges down the track and lofts it over the bowlers head for a one bounce four
held it back a touch this time and its bowled much flatter, defended back to the bowler
flighted on leg stump, worked away to midwicket where yet another fumble allows the batsmen to scamper back for the second. The fielding has been atrocious today
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
down the leg side, given a wide
short of a length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, pushed wide of cover for a quick run
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
short and wide, bowled from round the wicket, cut away in the vacant point region for a couple
fired in quick on middle and leg, comes down the track and pushes it straight to midwicket
Murali continues to throw it up, on the off stump this time, Dhoni dances down the track and drives it back to him
gives him the charge again, driven firmly to long-off for a single
spun away sharply, landed on a good length outside off and left Gambhir as he attempted a cut
worked away wide to fine leg
pushed wide of point for a single
cut away straight to point
tossed up outside off, charges down the track and slaps it to long-on for a couple
short on middle and leg, pushed to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, turned away to midwicket
tossed up again, comes down the track, closes the face and pushes it wide of midwicket for a run
straying on the pads, gently tucks it behind square for a couple
flighted on middle and leg, dropped short of midwicket on the leg side for a single
straying down the leg side, given a wide
short and wide, Dhoni hits it well, but straight to deep cover
lands on a good length outside off and spins away, left alone
flighted on middle and leg, comes down the track and looks to drive it powerfully down the ground, mistimes it back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, cut away to deep cover

bowled flat and quick on middle, works it away gently into the leg side, by the time it reaches the deep midwicket fielder, who's standing on the boundary line, the batsmen have come back for the second
tossed up outside off, pushed firmly to long-off
straying on the pads, Dhoni paddles it fine for an easy couple
that was coming, flighted on middle and leg, Dhoni dances down the track, takes it on the half-volley and deposits it over the long-on boundary for a big one
and he now just tucks it away towards deep square leg
flighted on middle and off, gets outside the line and flicks it away to deep midwicket for a single
comes down the track but is not quite to the pitch, defends it wide of cover on the off side
flighted outside off, creamed towards cover where Dilshan pulls off a good save to prevent any run
short of a length outside off, Gambhir gets on the back foot and late-cuts it wide of point for three runs. Brings up the 150 partnership
flighted on middle and leg, pushed it wide of square leg for a couple more, excellent running
takes a bit of a breather this time, defends it on the off side
flighted outside off, opens the face to place it wide of point for a single
tossed up, pitched outside leg and spun into Gambhir, tries to work it away, is hit on the pads, stifled appeal but everyone knows that can't be given
flighted on middle and off, is down the pitch and lofts it in the direction of long-off. Not well timed there
short on middle and leg, turned away wide of short fine for a single
short of a length outside off, makes room and bunts it wide of point for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, comes down the track and lofts it in the direction of deep midwicket, just a chip
good fielding by Dilshan, that was struck powerfully to him at cover off the back foot
tossed up outside off, pushed into the off side and sets off, is sent back by Gambhir and makes it back comfortably before Sangakkara takes off the bails
flighted on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
he goes for it, full on middle and off, he comes forward and slogs it over long-on for a boundary. False start for Dilhara
full on leg stump, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
full on middle and off, almost yorker length and swung in a touch, dug out on the leg side
full outside off, creamed through the off side towards deep cover
bouncer banged in short outside leg stump, Gambhir lets it go, given a wide
short of a length on the off stump, dropped on the off side towards point
good length on the off stump, pushed firmly to cover
short of a length outside off, struck away to cover
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long-off
pitched on middle and leg, spinning down leg, Gambhir tries to work that away towards midwicket, is hit on the pads, gets a legbye
flighted on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a single
on middle and leg, flicked away gently towards deep square leg, there's ample time for the batsmen to come back for the second
flighted on middle, comes down the track and drives it straight to midwicket
short of a length on middle and leg, whipped away to fine leg
short again, run down to third man for a single
full on the pads, flicked away wide of fine leg, Kulasekara fields well there to prevent the second.
full on the off stump and a hint of away swing, driven down the ground to long-off
full on the pads, glanced down to fine leg  for a single
short of a good length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side off the back foot
short on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
short on leg stump, worked away wide of square leg for a single
bowled flat on middle and off, defended on the off side
fired in straight on the off stump, pushed to cover
gave it some air outside off, Dhoni pushed just wide of long-off and came back comfortably for the second

another fumble and it costs a boundary, bowled short outside off, Gambhir waited for it and guided it well wide of third man, Kulasekara dives to his right but fails to prevent the ball from rolling over the ropes
similar ball, almost the same result, run down wide of third man, but Kulasekara does well this time, gets his body nicely behind the ball to keep the batsmen to two
good length outside off, pushed through the off side to deep cover
good bouncer, Dhoni tried to drag that from well outside off, withdrew from the shot at the right moment
short of a length on middle and off, defended off the back foot short of midwicket
full outside off, driven off the front foot wide of mid-off for a single. 200 up for India
goes for the big one but fails to connect, bowled full on the pads from round the wicket, tried to loft that over deep midwicket, struck on the pads

dropped, tells you the story of the day, tossed up outside off, Dhoni charges down the track to loft it over long-off, mistimed it in the direction of deep point, Angelo Mathews runs forward to cover good ground but makes a mess of it after doing all the hardwork

gone! finally! Dhoni had made up his mind to go after Jayasuriya, came down the track to smash it over long-on, got a thick outside edge and Dilhara Fernando took a couple of steps backwards at point to take a well judged one-handed catch
short of a length on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
turned away to short fine
short outside off, cut away towards deep cover for a single. He's off the mark
poor ball, short outside off, Yuvraj stands his ground and pulls it away powerfully wide of midwicket for a boundary
missed opportunity, short and wide, he goes for the cut, fails to make contact as the ball zips past him
bowled neck and crop! The danger man is gone! Yorker fired in on middle and off, Yuvraj was taken completely by surprise there, failed to bring his bat down in time to find his stumps uprooted

gone! Kulasekara on a hatrick!! Sri Lanka have fought back well here. Short of a length outside off, a seemingly harmless delivery that Yusuf tries to run down to third man, gets the inside edge and the ball crashes into the off stump
played well, good length on middle and leg, driven firmly off the front foot wide of midwicket, and they come back easily for the third
short of a length on middle and off, pushed wide of point for a single

straying on the pads, it seemed as though Gambhir played it but the umpire thinks it flicked the pads on the way to the fine-leg boundary. Replays show it was off the bat. What is our friend Dharmasena doing?
slower ball bowled on a good length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
good length on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket for a quick single
short of a good length outside off, struck off the back foot to deep cover for a single
slower ball bowled short outside off, chopped down wide of point for a single
full on middle and leg, worked away to midwicket
short outside off, cut away to point where Dilshan fumbles but the batsmen decide against the single
yorker on the off stump, dug out well by Gambhir
short of a length outside off, pushed straight to cover
good length outside off, chipped uppishly wide of cover, didn't  miss the fielder there by much
low full toss on the off stump, driven back to the bowler, missed opportunity
shot! Identical delivery and Raina cashes in this time, driven firmly wide of the bowler and mid-off for a pressure-relieving boundary
short of a length outside off, there's a short third man now, cut away straight to him
poor ball, he's erring in length here, slower ball bowled short outside off, cut away firmly wide of deep cover for a boundary
short of a good length on the off stump, dropped short of cover for a quick single
poor ball, short and wide, Raina slashes it away between point and short third man for a boundary
down the leg side, Sri Lanka are letting it slip here after a good comeback, given a wide

good length landing a touch outside leg stump and swinging into Raina, he's struck on the pads while trying to work it away towards square leg, looked close but replays confirm Dharmasena was right this time as he turns down the appeal
full on middle and off, tries to flick it away wide of midwicket, gets a leading edge that lands well wide of cover
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
that's it, he reaches his sixth ODI century, full outside off, he makes room and lofts it over extra cover. What a knock, he was sedate early on and opened up in the middle overs.
similar delivery but there is a fielder in the deep, driven firmly to deep cover
full outside off, lofted in the direction of long-off, not as well timed but Raina wouldn't have wanted to as there was fielder in the deep
length ball outside off, steered wide of third man for a couple
good length on the off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover for a single
short and wide, spinning away, looks to cut, misses
on middle and leg, turned away towards fine leg for a single
quicker ball on middle and off, pushed between mid-off and cover for a single
tossed up outside off, gets outside the line and paddles it well wide of fine leg for three runs.
short on the off stump, punched off the back foot to long-off. 250 up for India
too wide outside off and going further with the spin, given a wide
flighted outside off, pushed off the front foot to deep midwicket for a single
flighted on middle and leg, lofted over midwicket for a couple
arm ball fired in on a good length outside off, looks to run it to third man, misses
tries to reverse-paddle this time, fired in outside off stump, misses again
flighted on middle and leg, he steps out and hits it cleanly between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary
the reverse-paddle works this time, short of a length outside off, played away wide of short third for a couple
low full toss on leg stump, driven towards deep square leg for a single
short outside off, given a wide again as it turns away sharply and Gambhir offers no stroke
cut away to point off the back foot
flighted outside off, charges down the track and gives himself some room at the same time, drives powerfully to bisect the gap between long-off and deep cover
on middle and leg,pushed into the leg side
the doosra, on middle and leg, worked away to fine leg
short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to mid-off
short outside leg stump, helped on its way to fine leg
full and wide, there to drive, Raina chases it, misses
good length on the off stump, pushed firmly down the ground to long-off
full toss outside off, makes room and slices it away to third man
short of a good length on middle and off, defended to point off the back foot
short of a good length on leg stump, played away wide of midwicket for single

Sri Lanka's woes continue! Short outside off, the batsman upper cuts it towards third man, it is within catching range and Kandamby runs forward to pouch it but fails to reach, it lands short and spins away after bouncing to deceive the fielder to the boundary
flighted outside off, driven wide of cover for a single
short and wide, cut away straight to point
flighted on middle and leg, comes down the track and drives it to deep midwicket
bowled flat and quick, lands full outside off, slog-sweeps it between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
short of a length outside off, cut away to deep point
flighted outside leg stump, turned away wide of short fine for a single
slower ball landing short outside off, Gambhir tries to run it to third man, misses
full on the leg stump, tries to loft it over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge well wide of the short -fine fielder all the way to the boundary
good length on the off stump, slapped back past the bowler to long-off
beaten, good length outside off, tries to run it down to third man, fails to make contact
shot! Short and wide and is punished. Raina waits for it and slashes it away wide of the diving point fielder to the boundary
an attempted yorker on leg stump, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
short outside leg stump, tries to pull it away but it hits him on his thighs
bowled flat outside leg stump, paddled to short fine for a quick single
flighted outside off, slog-swept between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
came forward but Murali spotted him, pitched it short on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a single
shot! Landed full on the off stump, comes down the track and creams that down the ground well wide of the long-off fielder for a boundary. Brings up India's 300
short of a length outside off, pushed into the off side for a single
shot! Full outside off, looks to paddle it fine initially but changes his mind at the last moment to open the face and guide it wide of third man
short of a length outside off, mistimes a pull to long-on
yorker length outside off, steered to point for a single
gets the treatment, full on the off stump and he lofts that over midwicket for a boundary. Beautifully timed, took his right leg out to smash that
slower ball bowled short outside off, tries to run it down to third man, misses
150 for Gambhir, driven down the ground to long-off. It's the first time its being done by a batsman in Sri Lanka. Superb knock!
Murali gets the record!! That was short outside off and Gambhir nicked it as he tried to cut it wide of point.
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
short outside leg, played away to short fine
worked away to short fine off the back foot
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
short on middle and off, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
Raina makes room and tries to force the ball straight but Maharoof gets his big frame down to cut it off, he hurls the ball back towards the stumps and Raina pushes it back
bowls the slow yorker and Raina digs it out wide of midwicket
full on the pads and he forces it away to the on side down to deep square-leg
Maharoof overpitches on the off stump, he bends his knee and clubs it on the front foot down after making just a bit of room for himself
strays on the pads and he clips it away down to fine leg
the slower ball and he lands it a fraction short, he makes room and softly taps it to short third man
bowls the slower legcutter, he gets under it and scoops it down to long-off
tries to mow a full delivery across the line but he fails to beat Kulasekara who stretches his left hand out and stops it
Raina reads the slower delivery early and goes for a huge heave ho over deep midwicket, the ball was in the air for a while and but the fielders could only watch
bowls a low full toss outside off and he pushes it down to deep cover
punches a low full toss hard down the pitch but can't beat the bowler

inn2.comm: some movement straightaway into the batsman, lands full outside off and swings in, left alone to the keeper
good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
first runs, on middle and leg, he tries to work it down fine, gets a leg bye
straying on the pads, Jayasuriya tries to glance it down fine, Ishant Sharma gives chase from a squarish fine-leg and cuts it off, the batsmen take three in the meantime
short on middle, the fine-leg fielder is kept busy again, pulled away all along the ground

lands full just fractionally outside leg stump and moves into Jayasuriya to strike him in line with the stumps as he tries to flick it off the front foot, Dharmasena shakes his head, and is right as it pitched outside leg
full on the off stump, some movement into Dilshan, driven straight to cover
the inswinger again, good length on middle and leg, played away wide of midwicket for a single
full on the pads, flicked away wide of square leg for three runs, straying in line there
short of a good length outside off, gets on the front foot and pushes it firmly off the front foot wide of mid-off for a boundary
short outside off, struck away between point and cover for three more runs. Pathan having some early trouble here
slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, defended towards square leg. Sound start for the batsmen in the first couple of overs
short of a a length on the off stump and moving away, Dilshan shoulders arms to the keeper
good length outside off, held its line, plenty of room for Dilshan who drives that on the up between mid-off and cover for a boundary
short and wide, slashes hard, gets a thick outside edge well wide of slip for a boundary

goes for it again but this one jagged back in, landed short of a good length outside off and swung in sharply as he tried to smash that through the off side,was nowhere near the pitch there, missed it
poor ball, short on middle and off, pulled away wide of square leg to the boundary
short and wide, there to cut, but plays the shot a touch too early, goes through to the keeper
down the leg side, Irfan struggling early on, given a wide
full outside off and shaping away from the left hander, much better, pushed off the front foot to mid-off
short of a length outside off, in the zone for Jayasuriya who cuts it away wide of a diving cover, gets three
full outside off, Dilshan goes for an expansive drive through the off side, mistimes it to mid-off
well struck but straight to cover, good length outside off, not to the pitch but plays through the line
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
full outside off, square driven straight to point. Better over from Irfan
on middle and leg, walks across to turn it away to midwicket
beaten by the slower one, it lands full outside off and cuts away off the pitch as Jayasuriya gets forward to defend
short outside off, slashed away to third man off the back foot
good length on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
huge shout for lbw, going down leg though, good length on middle and leg and angling down, strikes him on the pads as he tries to flick it away towards square leg
short and wide, mistimes a cut straight to point
short of a good length on middle and off, pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket for a single
he bowls on the leg stump, pushed off the front foot towards square leg and scampers a quick single
erring in length there, full on the pads, just chips it over midwicket for a one bounce four. Excellent timing
bouncer banged in short on middle, he ducks under it
poor bowling, gets the treatment, meaty overpitched delivery outside off, Jayasuriya charges down the track and carts it over the deep-cover boundary for a massive six
much shorter, tries to pull it away over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads
good length outside off and kicks off the pitch, some away movement there as well, tries to cut that off the back foot, misses
full outside off, there to hit, Dilshan obliges by driving it powerfully wide of mid-off for a boundary
held it back a touch, defended off the front foot to cover
a slower offcutter on the stump, defended off the front foot to point
short of a length on the off stump, chopped down to point off the back foot
full outside off and swinging away, he chases it, goes for a blazing drive through the covers, misses it completely
Irfan is being hammered here, just a fraction full outside off stump, Jayasuriya makes room and smashes it over the deep cover boundary for a flat six

gone! Shorter this time, just marginally outside off, Jayasuriya tries to slap that through the off side off the back foot, was surprised by the bounce there, got more elevation that he would have liked and Rohit Sharma at short cover snaps a smart catch
bouncer banged in short on middle, he ducks under it comfortably
sweetly timed, full outside off and swings away just a touch, he leans into the drive, placing it wide of a diving Raina at cover for three runs
slower ball that deceives Dilshan, lands short outside off and cuts away as Dilshan tries to pull that towards midwicket. Played the short way too early there
good length on leg stump, tries to flick it away fine, is hit on the pads, they get a leg bye
full on middle and off, tries to push it through the off side, gets a thick inside edge towards mid-on and they grab a single
good length on middle and off, pushed off the front foot to mid-off where Ojha misfields to allow the batsmen to come back for the second.
slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
good length on middle and off, defended watchfully on the off side
on middle and off, tries to play it on the up towards mid-off, gets an inside edge onto the pads
straying on the pads, flicked away uppishly wide of Ishant at fine leg for a couple
an offcutter landing full outside off, Dilshan drives through but fails to connect as the ball leaves him at the last moment
overpitched again, driven firmly wide of cover for a single
full on the off stump, turned away off the front foot wide of mid-on for a couple more
full outside off, opens the face slightly to place it wide of point for a single
hopeless delivery, slower ball landing full outside off, Dilshan cashes in, playing a blazing drive through the covers
much better, an inswinger bowled on a good length on middle and leg, driven to mid-on for a single
well wide outside off and going away further with the swung, Dilshan fails to reach it, surprising that wasn't called a wide
short of a length outside off, Dilshan slashes hard but the ball keeps a fraction low
on target this time, lands on a good length on the off stump, defended to cover
short on the off stump, Dilshan makes room and cuts that wide of third man for a well run couple
slower ball bowled on the off stump, pushed to point
short of a length on middle, comes down the track to push it wide of cover for a quick single
short of a length outside off, good bounce there, tries to cut but the ball spits off the pitch to just evade the outside edge
short on middle, turned away to fine leg, rolls his wrists over it
short of a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
just fractionally wide of the off stump, pushed to cover off the front foot
short of a good length outside off, punched off the back foot towards deep cover
good length on the off stump, opens the face at the last moment to guide it to third man for a single
tame dismissal there, short outside off, he walks across and tries to heave it over midwicket, gets the top edge and Yuvraj at point takes a dolly.
full on the pads, driven through the line to mid-on
short of a length outside off, Sangakkara prods at it off the back foot but fails to make contact
on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on off the front foot
plenty of space in the off side, short and wide and cut away through the vacant cover region
almost dragged it on there, short of a length on the off stump, waits for it and tries to dab it down to third man, gets an inside edge onto his pads
good bounce here for Ishant, short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
much fuller outside off, hit firmly but straight to cover
shot! A touch too wide from Ishant, Sangakkara has enough room to cut it away wide of point for a boundary
good length outside off, Sangakkara pushes it back firmly past the bowler but straight onto the stumps at the non-striker's end
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
short of a length on middle and leg, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
short of a good length on middle and off, defended on the off side
fuller on the off stump, pushed to cover off the front foot
shorter on middle and off, pushed firmly to mid-off
slower ball bowled on a good length on middle and off, tries to work it wide of mid-on, gets a leading edge towards mid-off
short of a good length outside off, guided to third man for a single
short of a length outside off, slapped back past the bowler to mid-off
short of a good length on middle and off, just a firm push down the ground and the ball races away past a diving mid-on fielder for a boundary
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, Sangakkara lofts it back over the bowlers head for another four.
short on middle and leg, works it away to fine leg for a single
full on middle and off, pushed wide of midwicket off the front foot
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to point
poor ball from Ishant, it's pitched short on the leg stump, Sangakkara walks across and works it away off his hips to the fine-leg boundary. Sri Lanka have done well to reach where they have so far.
short of a length on the off stump, chopped down to point
tossed up this time, drifting into the batsman, defended watchfully
hardly any turn here, short of a length on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a single

finally, some turn and bounce there, pitched on a good length outside off and spun in sharply, it stopped on him a touch and he played it uppishly towards short midwicket. The ball lands just a fraction short of the fielder there
pushed into the off side for a single
on the pads this time, worked away towards fine leg
short and wide, spinning into the right hander, makes room and cuts it away wide of point for a couple
flighted on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted on the leg stump, worked away wide of square leg
tossed up on the off stump, dropped on the off side for a quick single
flighted on the off stump, driven to short cover
slightly shorter, pushed off the back foot to the same fielder
tossed up on the off stump, pushed to cover
short of a length on the off stump, punched to cover, Raina gathers and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end. Sangakkara, though, is well in and they get a single off the ricochet
tossed up outside off, worked away to Raina at midwicket for a quick single. He rockets in a throw to the keeper and Dhoni takes off the bails but Mahela is well in
flighted on middle and off, spins away sharply, Mahela gets a thick outside edge towards point
beaten this time, drifting into the batsman and spinning away sharply, Mahela came forward to defend but was done in by the spin
flighted on middle and off, defended into the off side
short on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
flat, and much quicker, driven wide of the bowler for a single to long-on
shot, lands on a good length outside off and spins into Mahela, he makes room, waits for the ball, and dabs it wide of short third man at the last moment for three runs
tossed up on leg stump and spinning into the left hander, pushed wide of Yuvraj at midwicket, Sangakkara has to dive in his attempt to make it to the other end
short of a length on middle and leg, worked away off the back foot to deep midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, driven off the front foot to long-on
tossed up outside off stump, guided wide of short third for a single
good spin for Ojha, flighted on middle and off, Mahela defends it on the leg side
given a wide but Mahela was lucky to survive there. Pitched outside leg and spun in sharply, Mahela left it alone but that didn't miss the leg stump by much
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
much shorter, dabs it off the back foot to point
tossed up on the off stump, gets outside the line to defend, is struck on the pads
pushed wide of midwicket for a quick single
tossed up outside off and spun into the right hander, he tries to fend that away on the leg side, is hit on the arm
full on middle and off, turned away to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, swept away firmly wide of Ojha at deep square leg for a couple
flighted on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
driven between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
tossed up on middle and leg, turned away towards fine leg
tossed up on the off stump, pushed into the vacant off side field for a single
fired in quick on middle and off, defended on the leg side
comes down the track but its pitched short, pushed to midwicket
short outside off, played straight to point
tossed up outside off, tries to defend it on the off side, lobs off the pads, Dhoni runs to his right and pouches but that was nowhere near the bat
arm ball and Sangakkara is beaten, he failed to pick it, pushed through quicker, lands on a good length outside off, is done in as he tries to play that on the leg side
flighted on the off stump, defended
tossed up on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on to bring up the 50 partnetrship
worked away off the back foot towards short fine for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to long-on
pushed into the leg side, decide against the single there
short and wide, cut away to deep cover
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to long-on
flighted on the off stump, driven to long-off
flighted on the off stump, swept away to deep square leg
flighted on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
pushed between point and cover for a quick single.
tossed up on the off stump, pushed down the ground to long-on
shorter on leg stump, worked away wide of midwicket for a single
short and wide, cut away through the vacant point region, Praveen Kumar runs to his left and cuts it off

gone!! Mahela was struggling there, short of a length outside off, tries to late-cut that past point, gets a thick outside edge that Dhoni fails to latch onto in the first attempt, the ball lobs off his gloves and he pouches it comfortably in the second.

tossed up outside leg stump, pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket, Rohit Sharma picks it up and records a direct hit at the non-strikers end, Kandamby is just in but he was taking it a little too easy there
tossed up on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long-off
tossed up outside off, pushed straight to cover
short on the off stump, pulled away wide of a diving midwicket for a couple as long-on cuts that off
thrown up outside, driven to long-off
plenty of flight there, pushed back past the bowler to long-off
flighted on middle and off, swept really fine for a couple
pushed in quicker on middle and off, defended off the back foot
quicker one again on middle, pushed into the off side
tossed up, short on middle and off, defended on the off side
turned away towards square leg for a single
tossed up on the off stump, pushed through to long-off for a single
shot! Just fractionally short outside off, Kandamby waits for it and dabs it wide of short third for two runs
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed into the leg side
flighted on leg stump, swept towards deep square leg, 50 for Sangakkara.
tossed up outside off, driven through the covers into the deep
fired in down the leg side, given a wide
flighted on leg stump, defended towards midwicket, decides against the single
flighted on middle and off, comes down the track and drives it to long-on
short on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
on the leg stump, turned away wide of square leg for a single
short on the leg stump, pulled away towards deep midwicket where Praveen Kumar does well to prevent that from going to the boundary after the ball lands just short of him
wide down the leg side, erring in line for once there
short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot wide of midwicket
opens the face to guide it straight to point
pushed off the back foot wide of cover for a single
quicker ball on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
pushed into the off side for a single
swept down towards short fine for another run

he's given him! Bowling from round the wicket, drifting into the batsman, the ball held its line, there was no spin on it, tried to cut it expecting the ball to turn, missed it completely as it went straight on to strike him in line with middle
flighted on middle, almost yorked himself there, dug it out back to the bowler
wide down the leg side, tries to work it fine, misses
tossed up on middle and off, comes forward to defend, gets an inside edge onto the pads
flighted on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
tossed up on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
driven off the back foot to long-off
short outside off, cut away firmly wide of point but Rohit dives well to his right to save a few runs
closes the face to turn it away towards deep square leg
looks to play straight but gets a thick inside edge wide of square leg for a single
flighted outside off, Kapugedara drives it firmly off the front foot to deep cover
flighted on middle and off, defended on the front foot
short of a length outside off, cut away to deep cover
spun in sharply there, cramped him for room as he shaped to play a cut, he chopped it down on the off side
pushed off the back foot wide of midwicket
beaten there, drifting into the right hander and zips away after pitching, Kapugedara played inside the line there and the ball just about escaped the outside edge
arm ball, played a touch too early there, tried to whip it away on the leg side, got a leading edge that landed safely in the vacant off side field
worked away towards deep square leg for a couple
flighted on middle and off, swept away to the same fielder
short outside off, some turn away from the left hander, Sangakkara tries to cut that wide of point, fails to make contact

that looked inevitable, Sri Lanka were struggling badly, flighted outside off, he comes down the track and tries to loft it in the deep extra cover region, times it well but gets the direction wrong, Gautam Gambhir at long-off runs a few paces to his right and cups an easy chance
pushed into the off side for an easy single
tossed up on middle and leg, worked away wide of square leg for a run
flighted on the off stump, defended off the front foot towards point
quicker through the air, lands on a good length outside off and spins away sharply as the batsman comes forward to defend
flighted on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up on the off stump, defended watchfully back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot towards deep cover
flighted on the off stump, defended on the off side.
short of a length outside off, pushed firmly into the off side
flighted on middle and off, played to cover
short of a length outside off, cut away wide of deep cover for a couple
gets a thick outside edge this time, opened the face to play it to point, but got an edge wide of point for a couple
tossed up outside off, he tries to play a similar shot this time but much squarer, opens the face again but the ball kisses the outside edge and Dhoni takes a sharp catch.
flighted outside off, defended off the front foot towards point
short of a length outside off, eased through the off side for a single
full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
first boundary in 21 overs, tossed up on middle and leg, swept firmly wide of deep square leg, too late
tossed up on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
flighted outside off, the cover fielder into the act again, it's driven straight to him
flighted on middle and leg, turned away straight to midwicket
flighted on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
arm ball this time, tries to defend it off the back foot, gets an inside edge towards short fine
flighted on the off stump, pushed to cover point off the front foot
width and driven firmly to deep cover for a single
tossed up on the off stump, tries to loft that over extra cover, mistimes it but still manages to get a couple as long-off cuts it off
short on middle and off, defended off the back foot
short of a length outside off and spinning away, cut away off the back foot to deep point
flighted on middle and finally some intent! He gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps it to the deep midwicket boundary
driven to long-on for a single
short of a length outside off, cut away to point
quicker one on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
flighted on middle and off, driven uppishly towards long-off for a single
tossed up outside off, paddled towards fine leg for a single
shot! Short of a length outside off, struck firmly off the back foot wide of deep cover for a couple
arm ball bowled short on leg stump, tries to turn it down fine, is hit on thepads, sends back the non-striker who is halfway down the pitch
short on the off stump, rocks back and lofts perfectly between deep cover and long-off for a boundary
flighted on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
arm ball bowled short outside off, mistimes a pull to midwicket

Fails to read the straighter one, arm ball targeting middle, Kapugedara gets on the back foot to play it on the off side while expecting it to turn away from him, ends up missing it completely and is bowled through the gate
flighted on middle and off, swept away uppishly towards deep square leg
tossed up on the off stump, driven straight to cover
thrown up on the off stump, defended watchfully on the off side
opens the face to guide it past point for a single, and they get another one on the overthrow
short of a length outside off, tries to run it past slip, it spins away sharply and he fails to connect
beaten straight away, good length outside off and moving away just as Kulasekara prods at it off the back foot
short of a length on middle and off, pushed back past the bowler to mid-on
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, pushed towards cover
full outside off, Maharoof makes room and creams that between mid-off and cover for a boundary
some more runs, full on middle and leg, flicked away wide of short fine to deep square leg for a couple
full outside off, he makes room to slice that wide of point, misses
short of a length on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket off the front foot
short of a length on middle and leg, makes room and lofts that over the bowlers head, doesn't time it well though and long-off cuts it off to keep the batsmen to a couple
low full toss on leg stump, tries to clear mid-on with a wristy chip but finds Rohit Sharma who takes the simplest of catches
well, he's gone first ball, and Irfan is on a hattrick! Full outside off, he makes room to clear the offside field, mistimes it and ends up lobbing an easy catch to Raina at cover.
Good length outside off, Dilhara is behind it, gets a thick outside edge wide of second slip towards third man
short on middle and leg, tries to pull it away to deep square leg, is hit on the thighs
flighted on the off stump, driven straight to cover
tossed up on middle and off, driven uppishly towards long-off
short of a length on the off stump, makes room and pushes it straight to cover
on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
arm ball on the off stump, slapped to long-off
short and wide, cut away straight to point
shot! Just fractionally full on the off stump, Kulasekara stays his ground and smashes that over the bowlers head for a boundary
and again, a slower ball bowled full outside off, Kulasekara creams it wide of a diving Rohit at deep cover for a boundary
full on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on
attempted yorker bowled a touch too wide outside off, tries to steer it to third man, misses
bouncer banged in short on middle, had the batsman in a spot of bother there, but there's no harm done
full on the off stump, driven straight to Raina at mid-off
Kulasekara is providing some much needed entertainment here, flighted on middle and off, he charges down the track and lofts it over long-off for a big one
turned away sharply, landed on a good length outside off, beat Kulasekara who came forward to defend
short and wide, this time he rocks on the back foot and cuts it away fiercely wide of point for a boundary
superb shot, he wasn't to the pitch there but went for it anyway, good length outside off, he stays rooted to his crease and lofts it cleanly over the long-off for boundary. Beautifully timed
on middle and off, defended watchfully on the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, flicks it away in front of square for a couple
good length on middle and off, pushed to mid-on
yorker on middle and leg, dug out on the off side, they scamper for a single, though Raina scores a direct hit at the strikers end
fielded superbly at third man, made room to cart that over the covers, gets a thick outside edge that falls just short of substitute Ravindra Jadeja who divesto his left to prevent a certain four
short on middle, dropped onto the off side off the back foot for a single
full on the pads, tries to drive that to midwicket, gets a thick inside edge and the ball rolls down the fine-leg boundary
short of a length outside off, cut away wide of point for a well run two
full on middle and leg, heaved over midwicket for a boundary. This is now Kulasekara's highest ODI score
slower ball that he failed to pick, landed short of a length outside off and cut away, tried to slog that over midwicket, but was into the shot too early
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to deep cover
full on middle, driven straight to midwicket
good length just fractionally down leg stump, Dilhara makes room to heave it into the leg side, misses
that's it, its all over! Slightly short of a length on the off stump, Dilhara makes to slog that into the stands, misses it completely and the stumps take a beating!
